Installation

How to use this theme.

Include via CDN

CSS

Include this before your </head>

<link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rajnandan1/brutopia@0.0.1/dist/assets/compiled/css/app.css" rel="stylesheet" crossorigin="anonymous">

Do not include the default bootstrap css. Use the above instead

JS

Include this before your </body>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js" integrity="sha384-geWF76RCwLtnZ8qwWowPQNguL3RmwHVBC9FhGdlKrxdiJJigb/j/68SIy3Te4Bkz" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
